verses.verse: Follow after <WG1377> love <WG26>; yet <WG1161> desire <WG2206> earnestly spiritual <WG4152> gifts <WG1161>, but rather <WG3123> that <WG2443> ye may prophesy <WG4395>.

For <WG1063> he that speaketh <WG2980> in a tongue <WG1100> speaketh <WG2980> not <WG3756> unto men <WG444>, but <WG235> unto God <WG2316>; for <WG1063> no man <WG3762> understandeth <WG191>; but <WG1161> in the spirit <WG4151> he speaketh <WG2980> mysteries <WG3466>.
But <WG1161> he that <WG3588> prophesieth <WG4395> speaketh <WG2980> unto men <WG444> edification <WG3619>, and <WG2532> exhortation <WG3874>, and <WG2532> consolation <WG3889>.
He that <WG3588> speaketh <WG2980> in a tongue <WG1100> edifieth <WG3618> himself <WG1438>; but <WG1161> he that <WG3588> prophesieth <WG4395> edifieth <WG3618> the church <WG1577>.

Now I would <WG2309> have you <WG5209> all <WG3956> speak <WG2980> with tongues <WG1100>, but <WG1161> rather <WG3123> that <WG2443> ye should prophesy <WG4395>: and <WG1063> greater <WG3187> is he that <WG3588> prophesieth <WG4395> than <WG2228> he that <WG3588> speaketh <WG2980> with tongues <WG1100>, except1487, 3361 he interpret <WG1329>, that <WG2443> the church <WG1577> may receive <WG2983> edifying <WG3619>.

But now <WG3570>, brethren <WG80>, if <WG1437> I come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> speaking <WG2980> with tongues <WG1100>, what <WG5101> shall I profit <WG5623> you <WG5209>, unless1437, 3361 I speak <WG2980> to you <WG5213> either <WG2228> by <WG1722> way of revelation <WG602>, or <WG2228> of <WG1722> knowledge <WG1108>, or <WG2228> of <WG1722> prophesying <WG4394>, or <WG2228> of <WG1722> teaching <WG1322>?

Even <WG3676> things <WG3588> without life <WG895>, giving <WG1325> a voice <WG5456>, whether <WG1535> pipe <WG836> or <WG1535> harp <WG2788>, if they give <WG1325> not <WG3361> a <WG3361> distinction <WG1293> in the sounds <WG5353>, how <WG4459> shall it be known <WG1097> what <WG3588> is piped <WG832> or <WG2228> harped <WG2789>?
For1063, 2532 if <WG1437> the trumpet <WG4536> give <WG1325> an uncertain <WG82> voice <WG5456>, who <WG5101> shall prepare himself <WG3903> for <WG1519> war <WG4171>?

So <WG3779> also <WG2532> ye <WG5210>, unless <WG1437> ye <WG5210> utter <WG1325> by <WG1223> the tongue <WG1100> speech <WG3056> easy <WG2154> to be <WG2071> understood <WG2154>, how <WG4459> shall it be known <WG1097> what <WG3588> is spoken <WG2980>? for <WG1063> ye will be speaking <WG2980> into <WG1519> the air <WG109>.

There are <WG2076>, it may <WG1487> be <WG5177>, so many <WG5118> kinds <WG1085> of voices <WG5456> in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>, and <WG2532> no <WG3762> kind <WG846> is without signification <WG880>.

If <WG1437> then <WG3767> I know <WG1492> not <WG3361> the meaning <WG1411> of the voice <WG5456>, I shall be <WG2071> to him <WG3588> that speaketh <WG2980> a barbarian <WG915>, and <WG2532> he <WG3588> that speaketh <WG2980> will be a barbarian <WG915> unto <WG1722> me <WG1698>.

So <WG3779> also <WG2532> ye <WG5210>, since <WG1893> ye are <WG2075> zealous <WG2207> of spiritual <WG4151> gifts <WG2212>, seek that <WG2443> ye may abound <WG4052> unto <WG4314> the edifying <WG3619> of the church <WG1577>.
Wherefore <WG1355> let him <WG3588> that speaketh <WG2980> in a tongue <WG1100> pray <WG4336> that <WG2443> he may interpret <WG1329>.
For <WG1063> if <WG1437> I pray <WG4336> in a tongue <WG1100>, my <WG3450> spirit <WG4151> prayeth <WG4336>, but <WG1161> my <WG3450> understanding <WG3563> is <WG2076> unfruitful <WG175>.

What <WG5101> is it <WG2076> then <WG3767>? I will pray <WG4336> with the spirit <WG4151>, and <WG1161> I will pray <WG4336> with the understanding <WG3563> also <WG2532>: I will sing <WG5567> with the spirit <WG4151>, and <WG1161> I will sing <WG5567> with the understanding <WG3563> also <WG2532>.

Else <WG1893> if <WG1437> thou bless <WG2127> with the spirit <WG4151>, how <WG4459> shall <WG378> he that <WG3588> filleth <WG378> the place <WG5117> of the unlearned <WG2399> say <WG2046> the Amen <WG281> at <WG1909> thy <WG4674> giving of thanks <WG2169>, seeing <WG1894> he knoweth <WG1492> not <WG3756> what <WG5101> thou sayest <WG3004>?
For <WG1063> thou <WG4771> verily <WG3303> givest thanks <WG2168> well <WG2573>, but <WG235> the other <WG2087> is <WG3618> not <WG3756> edified <WG3618>.
I thank2168, 3450 God <WG2316>, I speak <WG2980> with tongues <WG1100> more than <WG3123> you <WG5216> all <WG3956>:

howbeit <WG235> in <WG1722> the church <WG1577> I had rather <WG2309> speak <WG2980> five <WG4002> words <WG3056> with <WG1223> my <WG3450> understanding <WG3563>, that <WG2443> I might instruct <WG2727> others <WG243> also <WG2532>, than <WG2228> ten thousand <WG3463> words <WG3056> in <WG1722> a tongue <WG1100>.
Brethren <WG80>, be <WG1096> not <WG3361> children <WG3813> in mind <WG5424>: yet <WG235> in malice <WG2549> be ye babes <WG3515>, but <WG1161> in mind <WG5424> be <WG1096> men <WG5046>.

In <WG1722> the law <WG3551> it is written <WG3754>, By <WG1722> men of strange tongues <WG2084> and <WG2532> by <WG1722> the lips <WG5491> of strangers <WG2087> will I speak <WG2980> unto this <WG5129> people <WG2992>; and <WG2532> not <WG3761> even thus <WG3779> will they <WG1522> hear <WG1522> me <WG3450>, saith <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962>.

Wherefore <WG5620> tongues <WG1100> are <WG1526> for <WG1519> a sign <WG4592>, not <WG3756> to them <WG3588> that believe <WG4100>, but <WG235> to the <WG3588> unbelieving <WG571>: but <WG1161> prophesying <WG4394> is for a sign <WG571>, not to the <WG3588> unbelieving <WG571>, but <WG235> to them <WG3588> that believe <WG4100>.

If <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> the whole <WG3650> church <WG1577> be assembled together <WG4905> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> speak <WG2980> with tongues <WG1100>, and <WG1161> there come in <WG1525> men unlearned <WG2399> or <WG2228> unbelieving <WG571>, will they <WG2046> not <WG3756> say <WG2046> that <WG3754> ye are mad <WG3105>?

But <WG1161> if <WG1437> all <WG3956> prophesy <WG4395>, and <WG1161> there come in <WG1525> one <WG5100> unbelieving <WG571> or <WG2228> unlearned <WG2399>, he is reproved <WG1651> by <WG5259> all <WG3956>, he is judged <WG350> by <WG5259> all <WG3956>;

the <WG2532> secrets <WG2927> of his <WG846> heart <WG2588> are <WG1096> made <WG1096> manifest <WG5318>; and <WG2532> so <WG3779> he will fall down <WG4098> on <WG1909> his face <WG4383> and worship <WG4352> God <WG2316>, declaring <WG518> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> among <WG1722> you <WG5213> indeed <WG3689>.

What <WG5101> is it <WG2076> then <WG3767>, brethren <WG80>? When <WG3752> ye come together <WG4905>, each one <WG1538> hath <WG2192> a psalm <WG5568>, hath <WG2192> a teaching <WG1322>, hath <WG2192> a revelation <WG602>, hath <WG2192> a tongue <WG1100>, hath <WG2192> an interpretation <WG2058>. Let <WG1096> all things <WG3956> be done <WG1096> unto <WG4314> edifying <WG3619>.

If <WG1535> any man <WG5100> speaketh <WG2980> in <WG2596> a tongue <WG1100>, let it be by <WG303> two <WG1417>, or <WG2228> at the most <WG4118> three <WG5140>, and <WG2532> that in turn <WG3313>; and <WG2532> let <WG1329> one <WG1520> interpret <WG1329>:

but <WG1161> if <WG1437> there be <WG5600> no <WG3361> interpreter <WG1328>, let him keep silence <WG4601> in <WG1722> the church <WG1577>; and <WG1161> let him speak <WG2980> to himself <WG1438>, and <WG2532> to God <WG2316>.
And let <WG1161> the prophets <WG4396> speak <WG2980> by two <WG1417> or <WG2228> three <WG5140>, and <WG2532> let <WG1252> the others <WG243> discern <WG1252>.
But if <WG1437> a revelation <WG601> be made to another <WG243> sitting by <WG2521>, let <WG4601> the first <WG4413> keep silence <WG4601>.
For <WG1063> ye all <WG3956> can <WG1410> prophesy <WG4395> one <WG1520> by <WG2596> one <WG1520>, that <WG2443> all <WG3956> may learn <WG3129>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> may be exhorted <WG3870>;
and <WG2532> the spirits <WG4151> of the prophets <WG4396> are subject <WG5293> to the prophets <WG4396>;
for <WG1063> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> a God of confusion <WG181>, but <WG235> of peace <WG1515>. As <WG5613> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> the churches <WG1577> of the saints <WG40>,

let the <WG5216> women <WG1135> keep silence <WG4601> in <WG1722> the churches <WG1577>: for <WG1063> it is <WG2010> not <WG3756> permitted <WG2010> unto them <WG846> to speak <WG2980>; but <WG235> let them be in subjection <WG5293>, as <WG2531> also <WG2532> saith <WG3004> the law <WG3551>.

And <WG1161> if <WG1487> they would <WG2309> learn <WG3129> anything <WG5100>, let them ask <WG1905> their <WG2398> own husbands <WG435> at <WG1722> home <WG3624>: for <WG1063> it is <WG2076> shameful <WG150> for a woman <WG1135> to speak <WG2980> in <WG1722> the church <WG1577>.
What <WG2228>? was it from <WG575> you <WG5216> that the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> went <WG1831> forth <WG1831>? or <WG2228> came it <WG2658> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209> alone <WG3441>?

If <WG1487> any man <WG5100> thinketh himself <WG1380> to be <WG1511> a prophet <WG4396>, or <WG2228> spiritual <WG4152>, let him take knowledge <WG1921> of the things <WG3739> which <WG3754> I write <WG1125> unto you <WG5213>, that they are <WG1526> the commandment <WG1785> of the Lord <WG2962>.
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> any man <WG5100> is ignorant <WG50>, let him be ignorant <WG50>.
Wherefore <WG5620>, my brethren <WG80>, desire earnestly <WG2206> to prophesy <WG4395>, and <WG2532> forbid <WG2967> not <WG3361> to speak <WG2980> with tongues <WG1100>.
But let all things <WG3956> be done <WG1096> decently <WG2156> and <WG2532> in <WG2596> order <WG5010>.
